contents.text: Thank you for calling Asana, the enterprise work management platform from San Francisco that helps teams coordinate and track all their work.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To request a live demo of the Asana platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a live demo of Asana’s platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your platform’s project-tracking features to help me coordinate our veterans outreach team.
Request a live demo of Asana’s enterprise platform to see its workflow automation in action
I’m interested in scheduling a live walkthrough of Asana to understand its features.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of Asana to explore how it could organize my physics research projects.

contents.text: To discuss enterprise pricing and plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our pricing team.

navigationGoals: I want details on enterprise pricing and available plans.
Can you give me details on enterprise plan pricing and any veteran or nonprofit discounts for supporting my veteran service organization?
Get detailed information on enterprise pricing tiers and volume licensing options
I’d like information on enterprise pricing options and help choosing the right plan.
I need detailed information on enterprise pricing plans for Asana for our university physics department.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support with your Asana account, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need help resolving a technical issue in my Asana account.
I’m having trouble logging into my account to access my support projects—please connect me to technical assistance.
Troubleshoot a sync error in my Asana workspace API integration
I need assistance logging into my Asana account and troubleshooting errors.
I’m having trouble syncing my Asana account with my lab’s code repository and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a billing question about my Asana invoice.
I need help reviewing my latest invoice and finding out if I qualify for any veteran billing adjustments or credits.
Clarify my current subscription invoice and update my payment method
I have questions about my Asana bill and need help reviewing my charges.
I have questions about my current Asana subscription invoice and upcoming billing charges.
